item.title: Welcome to STAT 385 @ UIUC
item.description:
Welcome

Welcome to STAT 385: Statistics Programming Methods at UIUC. The following will serve as our course website. Please excuse the dust as it becomes sea worthy.

Course Information

Location: Noyes 161

Time: Monday, Wednesday, and Friday, 3:00 PM - 3:50 PM

Generated using:

# Load ggplot2 mapping extension
library("ggmap")

# Capture Image from Google Maps
noyes_map = get_map(location = c(lon = -88.225840, lat = 40.108322),
                     color = "color",
                     source = "google",
                     maptype = "satellite",
                     zoom = 18)

# Classroom location
pt = data.frame(lat = 40.108322, lon = -88.225840)

# Map away
ggmap(noyes_map) + geom_point(data = pt, aes(x = lon, y = lat), 
                               color = "red", size = 5, alpha = 0.5) + 
                    xlab("Longitude") + ylab("Latitude") +
                    ggtitle("Noyes Center")
